description.value:
When integrated into a ship's Auspex and Propulsion, allows a ship to safely plot warp jumps of up to 5-10 days with +10 Navigation(Warp) Test without a Navigator. Disliked by the Navigator's Guild.

Requirements

A Rare Archeotech Item, They are Good Craftsmanship by default, with no Poor or Common Craftsmanship versions. (if there are, they're probably fake)

Effect: Near Unique

Notes: -
